title: Can League of Legends Inactive Summoner Names be claimed with new Accounts?
body: There is an account that has never played a single game (according to op.gg) for 2 whole seasons.... Is it possible if the account does go inactive, to create a fresh account and claim it?

replies.body: The best way to check for that is by trying to buy the name change to the name you're wanting to get. If it lets you, huzzah! If it doesn't work, that means the name is still taken and active.

I believe he was asking if it's possible to claim an inactive name with a *fresh* account. If the purchasing name change option displays green, it means the name is available, but it doesn't state whether it's an inactive name, or a removed name. If it's inactive only, the name can only be taken through a name-change, not by a fresh account..
